metadata.description: The relationship and reports for training disruptions.

configuration.name: qry
configuration.value: CASE WHEN `primary_form+resumption_date` IS NOT NULL THEN 'Resumed Training' ELSE 'Did Not Resume Training' END

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: A string to determine if this disruption has been resumed or not.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The category for the reason this disruption occurred.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: The demographic details of the person taking this training.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: A pie chart of all discontinuation categories.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: A chart of all discontinuations by reason.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: A chart of all discontinuations by year.

configuration.name: description
configuration.value: A pie chart of disruptions that have been resumed or not.
